metadata.description: A psychedelic collection of comics that includes an adaptation of 19th century occultist Helena Petrovna Blavatsky's work. What Parsifal Saw collects work produced by artist Ron Regé, Jr., whose interest in esoteric ideas and spirituality has permeated into all aspects of his comics, as highlighted by "Cosmogenesis," which concerns magical, alchemical, ancient, and mysterious ideas; cosmic consciousness, psychedelia, outsider rawness, and pure cartoonish joy.
metadata.name: What Parsifal Saw
